Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $699.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:59:49 UTC – Details)


Dell Inspiron Compact Desktop 3891 is engineered with: 11th Generation Intel® Core i5-11400 processor (6-Core, 12M Cache, 2.6GHz to 4.4GHz), 12GB 2933MHz DDR4 (8Gx1 + 4Gx1, 1 TB 7200 RPM [SATA] (HDD) 3.5-inch, Intel® UHD Graphics 730 with shared graphics memory, Black
11th Generation Intel Core i5-11400 processor (6-Core, 12M Cache, 2.6GHz to 4.4GHz)
12GB 2933MHz DDR4 (8Gx1 + 4Gx1), 1 TB 7200 RPM SATA HDD 3.5-inch
Intel Wi-Fi 6 2×2 (Gig+) + Bluetooth 5.1

Previous page
Next page

Performance you can count on

Latest processor: Built with the latest 11th Gen Intel Core i5 processor you can expect fast, reliable performance and an exceptional PC experience.

  • 11th Gen Intel Core i5-11400 processor (6-Core, 12M Cache, 2.6GHz to 4.4GHz)
  • Intel UHD Graphics 730 with shared graphics memory
  • 1TB 7200RPM 3.5″ SATA hard drive
  • 12GB (8Gx1 + 4Gx1) DDR4, 2933MHz memory

Minimal design, maximum efficiency.

Space-saving exterior: Our latest Inspiron Compact Desktop is designed to be space-efficient to compliment your work from home setup or office environment.

Finish tasks faster: Watch all your applications perform at their fullest with features including memory of 12GB DDR4, at 2933 MHz.

Your command center: Connect all your devices in a snap with plenty of front facing ports for easy access.

Ports and Slots

1. Power Button | 2. Global Headset Jack | 3. (2) USB 2.0 | 4. (1) USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C | 5. (1) USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A

Essential accessories for your Inspiron Compact Desktop

Dell 24 Monitor – S2421HS

Dell Keyboard & Mouse -KM7120W

Dell 27 Monitor – S2721HS

Clear views

Superb screen clarity in 1920 x 1080 Full HD resolution on a 23.8″ monitor.

Conveniently switch

Seamlessly connect to three PCs.

Consistent colors

Superb screen clarity in 1920 x 1080 Full HD resolution

Adjust to your comfort

Pivot, tilt, swivel and adjust the height for a comfortable setup all day long.

Easy Pairing

Instantly pair each device with your compatible Windows 10 system via Bluetooth.

Dell EasyArrange

Stay organized between applications, emails and windows on one screen.

3

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {
var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);

var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,

);

About Us

GIGABYTE offers a comprehensive product lineup that aims to “Upgrade Your Life.” With expertise encompassing consumer, business, gaming, and cloud systems, GIGABYTE established its reputation as one of the leaders in the industry with products including motherboards, graphics cards, laptops, mini PCs, monitors, and other PC components and accessories.

Read more




That which resonates with your life

“Upgrade Your Life” is the core essence in everything we do at GIGABYTE. We break new ground. We also continuously provide reliable cloud infrastructure to help businesses optimize their operations as well as to advance development and expansion in the digital realm. By combining innovation and practicality, GIGABYTE wields the technology of the future to improve your life today.

When ideas manifest into reality

We have your bases covered, starting with the motherboard. With an established reputation for trusted quality, we pushed forward with graphics cards, laptops, and mini PCs, and corporations worldwide depend on us for reliable server solutions. Most of all, we have always been there innovating products that will spark your creativity.

Foretelling your future in tech

Visualize this: Tapping your phone connects you to cloud. Your city is on a 5G network integrating medical, transportation, and power services. Our vast product range can meet your personal, business, and computing needs and prepare you for future trends and developments. Using technology, we can achieve anything we visualize, and beyond.

Read more

4.5
Price: $999.00 - $799.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:41:36 UTC – Details)

item.title: CYLEN Home Office Seat Cushion – Comfort Memory Foam Chair Cushion with Cooling Gel Infused for Tailbone, Coccyx, Back & Sciatica Pain Relief (Grey)
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Short PlushGEL ENHANCED SEAT CUSHION – If you want premium high-density memory foam plus gel, our pick is the Gel Enhanced Seat Cushion. The memory foam is durable, comfortable, and long-lasting while the gel prevents the cushion from feeling too hot. A soft, machine-washable short plush cover makes it easy ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $39.99 - $27.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:35:39 UTC – Details)



Short Plush
GEL ENHANCED SEAT CUSHION – If you want premium high-density memory foam plus gel, our pick is the Gel Enhanced Seat Cushion. The memory foam is durable, comfortable, and long-lasting while the gel prevents the cushion from feeling too hot. A soft, machine-washable short plush cover makes it easy to keep clean. Non-slip rubber dots on the bottom means it won’t slide out of your chair as you shift around
QUITE PORTABLE CHAIR CUSHION – The carrying handle makes it easy to move from seat to seat and it’s perfectly sized for a work chair or use in a wheelchair. Great for office, home, travel, car seat or wheelchair use. You can even use it outdoors, but the cover isn’t waterproof, so save it for dry weather
ERGONOMIC “U” SHAPED CUTOUT DESIGN – Whether you’re working from home, sitting in an office chair, a car or truck, or any kind of seat at all, the U-shaped cutout for your tailbone is specifically designed to maximize comfort and support while reducing pressure on your tailbone. The CYLEN office chair cushion can make your day more enjoyable and keep away those aches and pains
IT’S A COMMON BYPRODUCT OF FATIGUE – You might slouch or begin leaning forward at an uncomfortable angle at your desk, and you might not even register the discomfort right away because your mind is intently elsewhere. This comfort seat cushion features ergonomic design to help soothe already-existing aches and pains that came about after months or even years of slouching and leaning
TIPS – Since it’s made of high-density memory foam, keep in mind that the firmness of the cushion can be affected by temperature fluctuations. Especially in cold weather, many users mention removing the cushion from the car; otherwise, it can become firm and hard and won’t return to its soft, supportive state until the material warms up again

4.5
Price: $39.99 - $27.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:35:39 UTC – Details)

(as of Nov 30,2022 06:23:31 UTC – Details)



【Memory Foam】Made of pure memory foam that adapts to your curves, provides superior comfort and helps with muscle fatigue. The premium memory foam never loses its shape and slowly rebounds to original shape after use.
【Friendly Design】Anti-slip rubber bottom prevents need for frequent readjustment. Built-in handle for easy portability. Removable cover makes cleaning easy. Additional mid-cover fabric to protect core foam. Breathable mesh cover allows air to circulate and prevents heat from collecting in the cushion.
【Ergonomic Design】 The ergonomically designed “U” shaped cushion helps to increase blood flow and support good gesture. Helps with muscle fatigue, leg tightness, and hamstring soreness. Popular with people who sit for more than 8 hours a day.
【Pain Relief Cushion】Place on any chair to provide extra support to your body to offload pressure on your spine, back, and sciatic nerve. Effectively relieve back, coccyx, sciatica, tailbone pain.
【Work with Any Chair】This ergonomic seat cushion provides comfort for people who sit in chairs and face screens all day. Great for office work, play games, watch movies, etc. If you travel by car, train or plane, but feel uncomfortable with the seat, this portable cushion will be your best travel partner. Bring extra comfort to your office, car, or chair!

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $29.99 - $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:19:41 UTC – Details)


Superior comfort Unlike some pillows that become flattened over time, the Samsonite lumbar support cushion will remain and never flatten thanks to the high-density memory foam structure. By attaching it to your chosen chair you are providing additional support to your lower back to help ease any discomfort. Hours spent sitting at a desk can negatively impact our posture so by using the support cushion you are creating an ergonomic experience that will provide comfort by moulding to the shape of your back.
Super easy to use Measuring 13.5 inches x 14 inches x 4.5 inches, the lumbar support cushion features an integrated adjustable strap that allows an easy and secure fit to most chairs including office swivel chairs, car seats, truck seats, dining chairs, plane seats and more, and wheelchairs. The convenient slider buckle positioned on the strap can be positioned easily for you to achieve the perfect fit. It only takes a moment to set your cushion up for a more comfortable sitting experience.
BUY NOW and support your lower back throughout the day with the lumbar support pillow from Samsonite
Mesh Cover
NEVER FLATTENS – give yourself superior lumbar support with our back support pillow. Designed to hold its shape even after multiple uses, it will never flatten down or thin out so you will always receive comfortable support wherever you choose to use it. The support pillow helps to improve posture and provide comfort whilst you sit and eat, drive, work, watch TV, read and so much more.
JUST THE RIGHT SUPPORT – the high-grade memory foam is perfectly firm, so you won’t find it too soft or too hard. Designed to suit most adults who require a lumbar support pillow for office chair, car or other seating option. Featuring an ergonomic curve, it sits perfectly against your back once secured in place providing you hours of comfort when you’re working or driving.
IMPROVE YOUR SITTING POSTURE – if you sit for long hours at a time in an office or drive long distances on a regular basis then you can create a more comfortable seating position by attaching our lumbar support pillow to your seat or chair. It is designed to offer support to your lower back thanks to the integrated memory foam which provides cushioning as you sit.
MULTIPURPOSE DESIGN – featuring an easy to use, adjustable strap you can use the lumbar support pillow in the workplace on your office chair, when relaxing at home, while driving your car on road trips, and on plane seats when flying. It is also great for adding to a wheelchair for more comfort and gamers love it for extra support when gaming. If you choose to use the lumbar support pillow for car journeys it will always remain in place, regardless of the terrain.
BREATHABLE EASY TO CLEAN MESH – the 3D mesh outer layer encourages air circulation throughout the pillow, you can remove this cover and machine wash it to keep your lumbar support pillow looking and smelling fresh. Make discomfort when sitting a thing of the past with our lumbar support pillow which will keep you stable, secure and cushioned when working, driving and relaxing.

Samsonite’s Ultimate Support for your Lower Back

This lumbar support pillow has been designed to help elevate comfort, particularly in your lower back, for those who sit for long periods of time at work, home office, or drive for long hours. This lumbar pillow keeps you sitting upright and secure throughout your busy day.

The Ideal Solution for an Office or your Home

This lumbar support pillow can be used in a wide variety of situations. Office workers find our lumbar pillow to be an essential accessory when working at their desks or home for extended periods of time as they are less inclined to slump in their chair.

Ultimate Lumbar Support for your Car

Excellent for long car journeys or those who drive long distance on a daily basis such as truck and taxi drivers or sales representatives, this lumbar pillow will help you to arrive at your destination feeling comfortable and refreshed.

Samsonite’s High-Grade Memory Foam

Each of our lumbar support pillows are made from high grade memory foam which naturally helps to mold your body to the pillow. Comfortable to use, yet firm enough to provide ultimate support, our lumbar pillow is designed to be durable and long lasting for multiple years’ worth of use. This back pillow also features a mesh, breathable outer layer to keep air circulating throughout the pillow.

Ergonomic Shape Designed to Elevate Comfort

This lumbar pillow complements your backs natural arches to elevate comfort while sitting for extended periods of time.This contoured shape of our lumbar pillow will gently help guide your lower back and spine to mold to the lumbar pillow for a secure and comfortable hold that provides maximum comfort.

4.5
Price: $29.99 - $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:19:41 UTC – Details)

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);

var offlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#offlineDay’);
var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);
var offlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCalendar’);

var thankYouDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_thank’);
var errorDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_error’);

var stateDefaultOption = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultOption’);
var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,

offlineMonth,

);

From the brand

Merry and Bright

Swipe left to learn more

Committed to creating a comfortable, cozy and festival ambiance for your outdoor & indoor space and life.

We are continually enhancing our product lines to bring you the newest technologies and features available in the marketplace.

We pays attention to not only colorful lighting but also your safety.

Enjoy Decorating Your Home

STRING LIGHTS

WINDOW LIGHTS

ICECICLE LIGHTS

HALLOWEEN LIGHTS

【More Comprehensive Functions】8 Lighting Modes Timer Memory8 options lighting modes make a playful addition to Christmas decor. Build in timer and memory, lights will auto on/off once set, don’t need to operate it manually. Saves your last lighting choice, which is more user friendly!
【Safer and Energy Efficient】High Efficient LED lights will save you money on energy costs, they’ll last longer than incandescent lights and you don’t have to worry about them overheating. Features upgraded 29V low voltage ETL adapter allowing end-to-end linkable up to 2 sets, max 1222 LED 132ft, so you can extend to decorate a greater area easily.
【Superior Weather Resistance】Our led lights use high-quality PVC wire and built with IP44 Weatherproof-Tech so that they can withstand all weather for year-round enjoyment. Please note that the adapter is NOT waterproof, please kindly protect the power adapter from the water!
【Popular Choice & Widely Used】Suitable for both outdoor & indoor Christmas decorations. Suitable for both outdoor & indoor Christmas decorations. White Christmas lights lend a timeless look, and they will give your home a whimsical, snow-covered appearance. More safer to kids and your family while Christmas party, family reunion, wedding party and BBQ outside.



Features

  • High Brightness: Features shatter-resistant acrylic LED bulbs with a concave lens, for a brilliant burst of light that looks great even from a distance.
  • Much Safer: The working voltage for the LED string light is only 29V, which emits extremely low heat. And the circuit board of adapter with short circuit protection puts your safety first. (All passed the UL588 test.)
  • Economic: Only 6 watts per set, saving money on your energy bills while you enjoy the beauty of brilliant Christmas lights.
  • Built to Last: The LEDs are wrapped with milky white sleeve and hot melt adhesive, that seal out moisture for longer life, and a lifespan up to 50000 hours.

These fantastic ice lights perfectly complement other outdoor decorations like Christmas window lights and help to transform your garden (usually at the front) into a festive grotto, especially when teamed with decorations like Outdoor Christmas decorations.

Product Parameters

Light Color: Cool White
Wire color: Clear wire
Number of leds: 611 LED
Number of drop wire: 141 drops
Light Length: 66ft (20m)
Power lead length: 11.5ft (3.5m)

5.5-in spacing between drops, and staggered drop lengths of 23.6 in, 15.7 in and 11.8 in, provide the virtual icy look for your home.


WIDELY USED–The Christmas lights are easy to install on overhangs, awnings, roof edges, windows and other places on your home’s exterior or interior.

Dense evergreen trees, like pines, firs and spruces, may require more lights. By wrapping bushes and shrubs with this ice string lights, you’ll cover a greater area with fewer strands and less work.


Read more




UL LISTED AND QUALITY INSPECTION

Clear wire with 29V UL listed power adapter led string lights create a safe and secure holiday for you and your loved one.

WITH MEMORY FUNCTION

Built-in memory chip, Saves your last lighting mode without you having to remember to reset so every night, which is more user friendly!

END TO END CONNECTABLE

Features upgraded adapter led string lights allowing end-to-end linkable up to 2 sets, 66ft 611 LED per strand, max 1222 LED 132ft. So you can easily light a greater area.

Read more


It is suitable for decoration in many scenes, but also suitable as a gift for our family, friends, classmate, lovers and so on.

Product Description

100% Polyester Mesh
Enjoy Pain-Free Life with Ultimate Comfort – Our back support pillow is adjustable to the contours of your body, making it a great lumbar support pillow while driving or working long hours. The seat cushion for office chair is of utmost relief for coccyx/tailbone pain.
Best Orthopedic Pillow – FORTEM chair cushion has an ergonomic “U” Shaped Cutout. This sitting pad is highly recommended by orthopedic experts as it alleviates pressure on the sciatica nerve to reduce back, leg, and butt pain. Enjoy it as an office chair cushion or as a car pillow.
Premium Quality and Easy Maintenance – The seat cushion and lumbar support pillow for car are made from 100% pure memory foam. It helps maintain a healthy body posture by absorbing some of the pressure against your body. This half donut cushion seat and back cushion are encased in a removable, washable mesh covers.
Versatile and Lightweight – Our lumbar support pillow for chair has adjustable elastic straps, it can also be used as a lumbar support pillow for car seat. Desk chair cushion can also work as a car seat cushion, or wheelchair cushion. Being portable, these memory foam seat cushions are your all-time travel companion.
One-year warranty – Enjoy being driver of your favorite car, truck, or gaming on your computer to heart’s content. Your FORTEM chair pillow and seat cushion for car come with a full year warranty.
